p: Telomerase-immortalized human corneal epithelial cell line [ 30] (hTCEpi; a kind gift from Prof. J. V. Jester, University of California, Irvine, CA, USA; authenticated and characterized according to ATCC standard protocols) between passages 24 and 30 was used in this present study. The hTCEpi cells were cultured in KGM-Gold™ growth medium (Lonza, Köln, Germany). Cells were sub-cultured on T75 tissue culture flasks (Sigma-Aldrich, Munich, Germany), incubated at 37 °C in 5% CO 2, and passaged every 5–7 days.
